description:
Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented Service Manager (Spring Boot)

Filter by datasource/namespace/node.

options.content:
# Service Manager Dashboard

**Team**: SaaS  
**Service**: Service Manager (Spring Boot)  
**Aim**: Monitor application health, performance, and resource utilization to ensure smooth operation and quick issue resolution.

---

## **Key Metrics**
- **CPU Usage**: Utilization and system load.
- **HTTP Requests**: Count, status codes (2xx, 4xx, 5xx), and response times.
- **JVM Metrics**: Heap/non-heap memory, garbage collection, and thread states.
- **Logs**: Log event rates (info, debug, error).
- **Buffers & Files**: Memory usage for buffers and open file descriptors.

---

## **Filters**
- **Namespace**: Narrow down metrics for specific namespace.

panels.description: This query measures the 1-minute system load average per pod, and enriches it with container and pod metadata (UID and IP). It helps identify overloaded pods and provides context for debugging and monitoring.
panels.title: Average CPU Count

panels.description: This query measures the 1-minute system load average per pod, and enriches it with container and pod metadata (UID and IP). It helps identify overloaded pods and provides context for debugging and monitoring.
panels.title: CPU Count vs System Load

panels.description:
1. **Non-Heap Memory Usage Percentage**: 
   Measures the percentage of used non-heap memory relative to the maximum allocated non-heap memory for sm pod  in specific namespace.


2. **Heap Memory Usage Percentage**: 
   Measures the percentage of used heap memory relative to the maximum allocated heap memory for a sm pod in specific namespace.

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", area="nonheap"}) * 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$application", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod", area="nonheap"})

panels.title: Heap && Non-Heap used
Average Max HTTP response time && Average HTTP response time

targets.expr:
(sum(increase(hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$application", pool="HikariPool-1", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[5m])) 
/ 
sum(increase(hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$application", pool="HikariPool-1", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[5m])))

panels.title: Average connection acquisition time in HikariPool-1 last 5 min.

sum(increase(hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", app=~"$application", pool="HikariPool-1", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$pod"}[5m])))
